Robert Schumann

Bunte Blätter, op. 99

1835–1849

[Wikipedia] · [IMSLP]

Total duration: 35'

  • 1. Drei Stücklein, no. 1
  • 2. Drei Stücklein, no. 2
  • 3. Drei Stücklein, no. 3
  • 4. Albumblätter, no. 1
  • 5. Albumblätter, no. 2
  • 6. Albumblätter, no. 3
  • 7. Albumblätter, no. 4
  • 8. Albumblätter, no. 5
  • 9. Novellette
  • 10. Präludium
  • 11. Marsch
  • 12. Abendmusik

This is a collection of pieces written over multiple years.

yearpiece
c. 1835no. 6
1837no. 5
1838nos. 1–3, 8–9
1839no. 10
c. 1839no. 7
1841nos. 4, 12–13

1849no. 14

Recommended editions

  • Gesamtausgabe (Schott) · III/1/6 · RSA 1021-10 · ed. Michael Beiche / Timo Evers
  • Associated Board · Sixteen Albumleaves · ed. Howard Ferguson [nos. 4–8]
  • Henle · HN 930 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band VI · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Robert Münster / Wolf-Dieter Seiffert
  • Henle · HN 931 · Sämtliche Klavierwerke / Band VI · ed. Ernst Herttrich / Robert Münster / Wolf-Dieter Seiffert
  • Henle · HN 81 · ed. Ernst Herttrich

1. Drei Stücklein, no. 1

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

2. Drei Stücklein, no. 2

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 4

3. Drei Stücklein, no. 3

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 2.5

4. Albumblätter, no. 1

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

5. Albumblätter, no. 2

This piece was possibly originally written for inclusion in Kinderszenen (op. 15).

Duration: 0' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

6. Albumblätter, no. 3

This piece was originally written for inclusion in Carnaval (op. 9).

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2

7. Albumblätter, no. 4

Duration: 2'

Difficulty: 2.5

8. Albumblätter, no. 5

Duration: 1' 30"

Difficulty: 2.5

9. Novellette

Duration: 2' 30"

Difficulty: 3.5

10. Präludium

Schumann might have originally intended to pair the prelude with a fugue.

Duration: 1'

Difficulty: 4

11. Marsch

Duration: 8'

Difficulty: 2.5

12. Abendmusik

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 2.5

13. Scherzo

This is an arrangment of the scherzo from the unfinished symphony in C minor (Anh. A6).

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 3

14. Geschwindmarsch

This piece was originally written for inclusion in the vier Märsche (op. 76).

Duration: 3' 30"

Difficulty: 3
